entry.tran: 目光锐利的；眼尖的;观察敏锐的
entry.def: If you describe someone as eagle-eyed, you mean that they watch things very carefully and seem to notice everything.

example.ex: Three cannabis plants were found by eagle-eyed police officers.
example.tran: 火眼金睛的警官发现了3株大麻。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of seeing to a great distance
